WHAT MAKES OUR SCHOOL SO SPECIAL?

  • You and your family will easily adapt and feel warmly welcomed in this truly international and multicultural school with more than 50 different nationalities represented in our student and staff population.
  • Your children will learn safely in our No Bully Zone.
  • Due to our double accreditation with the Council of International Schools (CIS) and the New England Association of Schools and Colleges (NEASC), CGB is able to offer our Seniors the possibility of graduating with THREE Diplomas: The International Baccalaureate Diploma, US High School Diploma, and Colombian High School Diploma.
  • We are the only school in Colombia in which the medium of instruction for your children is English as a first language, and the curriculum is delivered by such a high percentage of internationally qualified teachers who speak English as a first language.
  • We offer an international curriculum recognised worldwide. Spanish and Colombian social studies are offered at different levels catering for the needs of our students.
  • We offer you innovative and diverse programmes for both Co-Curricular Activities and Performing Arts that take place during the school day.

Welcome to CGB

A community of dynamic and global learners where the heart of our educational experience is focussed on the development of the whole child. We deliver a broad and balanced curriculum that offers well-known and respected international academic programmes, as well as opportunities for personal growth and enrichment. Our founding principles, beliefs and mission are underpinned and lived everyday through the eight foundation blocks.

CGB offers small class sizes, highly qualified teachers and a broad specialized support team to ensure that students are treated as individuals and receive the orientation that each one needs to succeed academically and flourish as a person. Our “No Bully Zone” ensures a caring and safe environment for students to learn, explore and make friends.

Suzanne McLean
Director

READ MORE

Colegio Gran Bretaña is a highly prestigious, private, co-educational, international day school (Nursery – Year 13) serving a predominately expatriate population representing more than 50 nationalities.

CGB follows the Northern Hemisphere Calendar from August to June (Calendar B).

Inquire & Visit
Why us?
learning at CGB

SCHOOL NEWS

Information about our most recent school activities!

#internationalschools #wearecgb #bogotaschools

Open

And that`s a wrap!

IBGC2024 has come to a close.
Last night`s dinner at the Ronald Regan Center was a fantastic celebration of the learning throughout this event.
This morning, there was an opportunity to network with other international schools, sharing perspectives and details of our work as global educators.
The closing ceremony saw an address from another IB alumni. A hilarious but inspiring keynote from Steve Bollar, an educational thought leader and motivational expert.
The conference ended with parting words from Olli-Pekka Heinonen, Director General of the IB, reminding all of us why the work we do every day is truly transformative and so very important.

It has been a wonderful experience that I am looking forward to bringing to life when school resumes next month.

#ThisIsCGB #WeAreCGB #LifelongLearning #IBGC2024

Open

Our director at the IB Global Conference 2024:

Following an inspiring keynote on the role of AI in education, the day shifted into sessions about building great professional development for staff that embodies the ideas of international mindedness.
This was followed by a dive into how to support student and staff well-being and encouraging staff to engage in research into wellbeing in education.
Then, there was a session on practical approaches to Diversity, Equity, and Inclusion in IB schools.

The day has closed with Ms Suzanne having the chance to attend an evening with Dr Charles Fadel and Olli-Pekka Heinonen the Director General of the IB to be part of a small group Q&A regarding his book Education for the Age of AI.

Open

Our Director Ms Suzanne McLean is currently in Washington DC at the IB Global Conference preparing to kick start the new academic year with some deep learning about the International bacclaureate programme.

Today she has engaged in preconference learning about Leadership for Deeper Learning. This workshop has focussed on how schools create rigour, the importance of relationships, voice choice and ownership in education and exploring deeper learning principles.

This afternoon the main conference will begin and what lies ahead are 3 more days of in depth learning and growth that are great foundation for what lies ahead in Colegio Gran Bretaña this year.
#ThisIsCGB #WeAreCGB #LifelongLearning #IBGC2024
